word:
Abridged

10 - Blossom as a Rose

Date: July 11, 1904 Location: Takoma Park, Maryland Source: Letter 239, 1904 Status: Previously unpublished
Context: Mrs. White writes another letter on the day she returns, this time to her grandnieces, the Walling sisters. 
Dear children Addie and May,
     I have desired to keep up a correspondence with you, and this is why I write. I have a deep interest in you both. I pray that in your lifework you may glorify the Lord.
